com.webs.api
Interface MemberApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
MemberApiImpl, WebsApiClient
public interface MemberApi

Interface which specifies all app-related calls to the Webs API

Author:
Patrick Carroll

Method Detail

getMember

WebsID getMember(WebsIDId websIDId,
                 SiteId siteId)
Get a member's information for a particular site

Parameters:
websIDId - The identifier of the member
siteId - The identifier of the site
Returns:
The member that was found or null if it was not found

getMembers

List<WebsID> getMembers(SiteId siteId)
Gets a list of all members on a given site

Parameters:
siteId - The identifier of the site
Returns:
A list of all members of the site

joinSite

WebsID joinSite(WebsID member,
                SiteId siteId)

updateMember

void updateMember(WebsID member,
                  SiteId siteId)
Update the member's information on the given site

Parameters:
member - The member with information to be set. This object must have either the id or emailAddress set.
siteId - The siteId of the site on which the information will be updated

updateMemberStatus

void updateMemberStatus(WebsIDId websIDId,
                        SiteId siteId,
                        String status)
Update the member's status on the given site

Parameters:
websIDId - The unique identifier for the member
siteId - The siteId of the site on which the information will be updated
status - The new status to be set

clearMemberStatus

void clearMemberStatus(WebsIDId websIDId,
                       SiteId siteId)
Clear a member's status on the given site

Parameters:
websIDId - The unique identifier for the member
siteId - The siteId of the site on which the information will be updated

leaveSite

void leaveSite(WebsIDId websIDId,
               SiteId siteId)

getFriends

List<WebsID> getFriends(WebsIDId websIDId,
                        SiteId siteId)
Get a list of all of a member's friends

Parameters:
websIDId - The unique identifier for the member
siteId - The siteId of the site
Returns:
The list of all members who are friends with the given member

getSiteSubscription

SiteSubscription getSiteSubscription(WebsIDId websIDId,
                                     SiteId siteId)
Get a site subscription

Parameters:
websIDId - The ID of the member
siteId - The id of the site to get the subscription from

getSiteSubscriptions

List<SiteSubscription> getSiteSubscriptions(WebsIDId websIDId)
Get a list of sites the given WebsID is subscribed to

Parameters:
websIDId - The ID of the member
Returns:
A list of all of the sites where the given WebsID is a member. If a valid OAuth token is passed with the appropriate permissions, private subscriptions will also be returned.

getSiteSubscriptions

List<SiteSubscription> getSiteSubscriptions(WebsIDId websIDId,
                                            String permission)
Get a list of sites the given WebsID is subscribed to and filter by permission

Parameters:
websIDId - The ID of the member
permission - Only subscriptions with this permission will be returned
Returns:
A list of all of the sites where the given WebsID is a member. If a valid OAuth token is passed with the appropriate permissions, private subscriptions will also be returned.
